webpack.description: Builds the extension in "dev" mode. Run `yarn webpack --help` for usage information.

webpack:clearcache.description: Deletes webpack's build cache. Useful to force a rebuild (webpack not detecting changes, node_modules have changed, etc).

postinstall.description: Runs automatically after running `yarn` (`yarn install`) in order to prime the webpack dev build.

@types/chrome.description: Provides type definitions for the Chrome extension manifest.json files.

buffer.description: Provides a global Buffer object for use in the browser (webpack)

crypto-browserify.description: Polyfill's node's crypto API for use in the browser (webpack)

dotenv.description: Loads environment variables from a .metamaskrc file (webpack)

os-browserify.description: Polyfill's node's os API for use in the browser (webpack)

process.description: Provides a global process object for use in the browser (webpack)

schema-utils.description: Provides utilities for validating options objects (webpack)

stream-http.description: Polyfill's node's stream API for use in the browser (webpack)

swc-loader.description: Transpiles javascript and typescript using swc (webpack)

vm-browserify.description: Polyfill's node's vm API for use in the browser (webpack)

tsx.description: Provides blazing fast typescript compilation (no type checking) (webpack)

rimraf.description: Provides a cross-platform way of deleting files from the command line (webpack)
